explains: vt. 以甜言蜜语哄骗；勾引

sentences.en: I managed to cajole his address out of them.
sentences.cn: 我终于从他们那里套出了他的地址。

sentences.en: He looked the gipsy over carefully, wondering vaguely whether it would be easier to fight him or cajole him.
sentences.cn: 他仔细地打量着吉卜赛人，心里模模糊糊，不知道跟他打架还是哄骗他更容易些。

sentences.en: For a whole year she has tried to cajole companies to take voluntary measures to promote more women.
sentences.cn: 过去一整年，她一直在试着说服公司志愿采取措施来为更多的女性升职。
